definitions.usage_example: There is an abundance of food.
definitions.usage_context_en: A very large quantity of something.
definitions.usage_context_es: Una cantidad muy grande de algo.

definitions.usage_example: Accessibility is important for the website.
definitions.usage_example_es: La accesibilidad es importante para el sitio web.
definitions.usage_context_en: The quality of being easy to approach, enter, or use.
definitions.usage_context_es: La cualidad de ser fácil de abordar, entrar o usar.

definitions.usage_context_en: The fact or condition of being responsible for one's actions.
definitions.usage_context_es: El hecho o la condición de ser responsable por las propias acciones.

definitions.usage_context_en: A person one knows slightly, but who is not a close friend.
definitions.usage_context_es: Una persona que uno conoce ligeramente, pero que no es un amigo cercano.

definitions.usage_example_es: La adaptación al cambio es difícil.
definitions.usage_context_en: The process of changing to suit new conditions.
definitions.usage_context_es: El proceso de cambiar para ajustarse a nuevas condiciones.

definitions.usage_example: She is an advocate for free speech.
definitions.usage_example_es: Ella es una defensora de la libertad de expresión.
definitions.usage_context_en: A person who publicly supports or recommends a particular cause or policy.
definitions.usage_context_es: Una persona que apoya públicamente o recomienda una causa o política particular.

definitions.usage_example: I like the aesthetic of this room.
definitions.usage_example_es: Me gusta la estética de esta habitación.
definitions.usage_context_en: The set of principles concerned with the nature and appreciation of beauty.
definitions.usage_context_es: El conjunto de principios relacionados con la naturaleza y apreciación de la belleza.

definitions.usage_example: What is on the agenda today?
definitions.usage_context_en: A list of items to be discussed at a formal meeting.
definitions.usage_context_es: Una lista de temas a discutir en una reunión formal.

definitions.usage_context_en: A claim or assertion that someone has done something illegal or wrong, typically made without proof.
definitions.usage_context_es: Una afirmación o aserción de que alguien ha hecho algo ilegal o incorrecto, típicamente hecha sin pruebas.

definitions.usage_example: The idea has a lot of appeal.
definitions.usage_context_en: The quality of being attractive or interesting.
definitions.usage_context_es: La cualidad de ser atractivo o interesante.

definitions.usage_context_en: An application to a higher court for a decision to be reversed.
definitions.usage_context_es: Una solicitud a un tribunal superior para que se revoque una decisión.

definitions.usage_example: There are many applicants for the job.
definitions.usage_example_es: Hay muchos solicitantes para el trabajo.
definitions.usage_context_en: A person who formally requests or applies for something, such as a job.
definitions.usage_context_es: Una persona que solicita formalmente algo, como un trabajo.

definitions.usage_context_en: Recognition and enjoyment of the good qualities of someone or something.
definitions.usage_context_es: Reconocimiento y disfrute de las buenas cualidades de alguien o algo.

definitions.usage_context_en: The art or practice of designing and constructing buildings.
definitions.usage_context_es: El arte o la práctica de diseñar y construir edificios.

definitions.usage_example: We need to do an assessment.
definitions.usage_context_en: The evaluation or estimation of the nature, quality, or ability of someone or something.
definitions.usage_context_es: La evaluación o estimación de la naturaleza, calidad o habilidad de alguien o algo.

definitions.usage_context_en: The action of helping someone with a job or task.
definitions.usage_context_es: La acción de ayudar a alguien con un trabajo o tarea.

definitions.usage_example: The atmosphere is thin at high altitudes.
definitions.usage_example_es: La atmósfera es delgada a grandes altitudes.
definitions.usage_context_en: The gases surrounding the earth or another planet.
definitions.usage_context_es: Los gases que rodean la tierra u otro planeta.

definitions.usage_example: The restaurant has a good atmosphere.
definitions.usage_example_es: El restaurante tiene un buen ambiente.
definitions.usage_context_en: The pervading tone or mood of a place or situation.
definitions.usage_context_es: El tono o estado de ánimo dominante de un lugar o situación.

definitions.usage_context_en: Knowledge or perception of a situation or fact.
definitions.usage_context_es: Conocimiento o percepción de una situación o hecho.

definitions.usage_example_es: El idioma puede ser una barrera.
definitions.usage_context_en: A fence or obstacle that prevents movement or access.
definitions.usage_context_es: Una valla u obstáculo que impide el movimiento o el acceso.

definitions.usage_context_en: A person who derives advantage from something, especially a trust, will, or life insurance policy.
definitions.usage_context_es: Una persona que obtiene ventaja de algo, especialmente un fideicomiso, testamento o póliza de seguro de vida.

definitions.usage_example: The article has a political bias.
definitions.usage_example_es: El artículo tiene un sesgo político.
definitions.usage_context_en: Prejudice in favor of or against one thing, person, or group compared with another.
definitions.usage_context_es: Prejuicio a favor o en contra de una cosa, persona o grupo en comparación con otro.

definitions.usage_context_en: A line that marks the limits of an area; a dividing line.
definitions.usage_context_es: Una línea que marca los límites de un área; una línea divisoria.

definitions.usage_example: It was a major scientific breakthrough.
definitions.usage_context_en: A sudden, dramatic, and important discovery or development.
definitions.usage_context_es: Un descubrimiento o desarrollo repentino, dramático e importante.

definitions.usage_example: I don't want to be a burden.
definitions.usage_context_en: A load, typically a heavy one, or a source of worry or stress.
definitions.usage_context_es: Una carga, típicamente pesada, o una fuente de preocupación o estrés.

definitions.usage_example: She has the capability to succeed.
definitions.usage_example_es: Ella tiene la capacidad de triunfar.
definitions.usage_context_en: The power or ability to do something.
definitions.usage_context_es: El poder o la habilidad de hacer algo.

definitions.usage_context_en: Care taken to avoid danger or mistakes.
definitions.usage_context_es: Cuidado que se toma para evitar peligros o errores.

definitions.usage_example: I need clarity on this issue.
definitions.usage_context_en: The quality of being coherent and intelligible; the quality of being easy to see or hear.
definitions.usage_context_es: La cualidad de ser coherente e inteligible; la cualidad de ser fácil de ver u oír.

definitions.usage_example: The shop has a wealthy clientele.
definitions.usage_example_es: La tienda tiene una clientela adinerada.
definitions.usage_context_en: All the clients of a business or professional person collectively.
definitions.usage_context_es: Todos los clientes de un negocio o profesional colectivamente.

definitions.usage_example_es: El matrimonio es un gran compromiso.
definitions.usage_context_en: The state or quality of being dedicated to a cause, activity, or person.
definitions.usage_context_es: El estado o cualidad de estar dedicado a una causa, actividad o persona.

definitions.usage_example_es: El petróleo es un producto valioso.
definitions.usage_context_en: A raw material or primary agricultural product that can be bought and sold.
definitions.usage_context_es: Una materia prima o producto agrícola primario que se puede comprar y vender.

definitions.usage_context_en: Sympathetic pity and concern for the sufferings or misfortunes of others.
definitions.usage_context_es: Lástima y preocupación solidaria por los sufrimientos o desgracias de los demás.

definitions.usage_example: I doubt his competence for the job.
definitions.usage_example_es: Dudo de su competencia para el trabajo.
definitions.usage_context_en: The ability to do something successfully or efficiently.
definitions.usage_context_es: La habilidad de hacer algo con éxito o eficientemente.

definitions.usage_context_en: The state or quality of being intricate or complicated.
definitions.usage_context_es: El estado o cualidad de ser intrincado o complicado.

definitions.usage_example: We need to reach a compromise.
definitions.usage_context_en: An agreement or settlement of a dispute that is reached by each side making concessions.
definitions.usage_context_es: Un acuerdo o arreglo de una disputa que se alcanza cuando cada lado hace concesiones.

definitions.usage_context_en: The action or power of focusing one's attention or mental effort.
definitions.usage_context_es: La acción o poder de enfocar la atención o el esfuerzo mental.

definitions.usage_context_en: Anxiety; worry.
definitions.usage_context_es: Ansiedad; preocupación.

definitions.usage_context_en: The manner in which a person behaves, especially in a particular place or situation.
definitions.usage_context_es: La manera en que una persona se comporta, especialmente en un lugar o situación particular.

definitions.usage_context_en: A result or effect of an action or condition.
definitions.usage_contex_es: Un resultado o efecto de una acción o condición.

definitions.usage_example_es: La consistencia es clave para aprender.
definitions.usage_context_en: Doing something in the same way over time to achieve accuracy or fairness.
definitions.usage_context_es: Hacer algo de la misma manera a lo largo del tiempo para lograr precisión o justicia.

definitions.usage_context_en: A limitation or restriction.
definitions.usage_context_es: Una limitación o restricción.

definitions.usage_example: I have a consultation with the doctor.
definitions.usage_example_es: Tengo una consulta con el doctor.
definitions.usage_context_en: A meeting with an expert, such as a doctor, in order to seek advice.
definitions.usage_context_es: Una reunión con un experto, como un médico, para buscar consejo.

definitions.usage_context_en: Prolonged public disagreement or heated debate.
definitions.usage_context_es: Desacuerdo público prolongado o debate acalorado.

definitions.usage_context_en: The state of being able to proceed with something with little effort or difficulty.
definitions.usage_context_es: El estado de poder proceder con algo con poco esfuerzo o dificultad.

definitions.usage_context_en: The organization of the different elements of a complex body or activity so as to enable them to work together effectively.
definitions.usage_context_es: La organización de los diferentes elementos de un cuerpo o actividad compleja para permitirles trabajar juntos eficazmente.

definitions.usage_context_en: The quality of being trusted and believed in.
definitions.usage_context_es: La cualidad de ser confiable y creíble.

definitions.usage_context_en: The expression of disapproval of someone or something based on perceived faults or mistakes.
definitions.usage_context_es: La expresión de desaprobación de alguien o algo basada en fallas o errores percibidos.

definitions.usage_context_en: A system of money in general use in a particular country.
definitions.usage_context_es: Un sistema de dinero en uso general en un país en particular.

definitions.usage_example: The storm caused a lot of damage.
definitions.usage_context_en: Physical harm caused to something in such a way as to impair its value or usefulness.
definitions.usage_context_es: Daño físico causado a algo de tal manera que perjudica su valor o utilidad.

definitions.usage_context_en: A formal discussion on a particular topic in a public meeting or legislative assembly.
definitions.usage_context_es: Una discusión formal sobre un tema particular en una reunión pública o asamblea legislativa.

definitions.usage_example: Her dedication to the job is impressive.
definitions.usage_example_es: Su dedicación al trabajo es impresionante.
definitions.usage_context_en: The quality of being committed to a task or purpose.
definitions.usage_context_es: La cualidad de estar comprometido con una tarea o propósito.

definitions.usage_example_es: Él tiene una deficiencia de vitaminas.
definitions.usage_context_en: A lack or shortage of something.
definitions.usage_context_es: Una falta o escasez de algo.

definitions.usage_example: We must protect our cultural heritage.
definitions.usage_context_en: Features belonging to the culture of a particular society, such as traditions or buildings.
definitions.usage_context_es: Rasgos pertenecientes a la cultura de una sociedad, como tradiciones o edificios.

definitions.usage_example: The highlight of the trip was the concert.
definitions.usage_example_es: Lo más destacado del viaje fue el concierto.
definitions.usage_context_en: The best or most exciting part of an event or period of time.
definitions.usage_context_es: La mejor o más emocionante parte de un evento o período de tiempo.

definitions.usage_example: She got highlights in her hair.
definitions.usage_example_es: Ella se hizo reflejos en el pelo.
definitions.usage_context_en: A strand of hair that is dyed a lighter color than the rest.
definitions.usage_context_es: Un mechón de pelo teñido de un color más claro que el resto.

definitions.usage_example: We need to test this hypothesis.
definitions.usage_context_en: A supposition or proposed explanation made on the basis of limited evidence as a starting point.
definitions.usage_context_es: Una suposición o explicación propuesta sobre la base de evidencia limitada como punto de partida.

definitions.usage_example: The implementation of the plan failed.
definitions.usage_context_en: The process of putting a decision or plan into effect.
definitions.usage_context_es: El proceso de poner en efecto una decisión o plan.

definitions.usage_example: What are the implications of this decision?
definitions.usage_example_es: ¿Cuáles son las implicaciones de esta decisión?
definitions.usage_context_en: The conclusion that can be drawn from something; a likely consequence.
definitions.usage_context_es: La conclusión que se puede sacar de algo; una consecuencia probable.

definitions.usage_example: The bonus is an incentive to work hard.
definitions.usage_example_es: El bono es un incentivo para trabajar duro.
definitions.usage_context_en: A thing that motivates or encourages one to do something.
definitions.usage_context_es: Algo que motiva o alienta a uno a hacer algo.

definitions.usage_context_en: An event or occurrence, typically one that is unusual or unpleasant.
definitions.usage_context_es: Un evento o suceso, típicamente uno que es inusual o desagradable.

definitions.usage_example: He has a high monthly income.
definitions.usage_example_es: Él tiene unos ingresos mensuales altos.
definitions.usage_context_en: Money received, especially on a regular basis, for work or through investments.
definitions.usage_context_es: Dinero recibido, especialmente de forma regular, por trabajo o a través de inversiones.

definitions.usage_context_en: The state of being free from the control, influence, support, or aid of others.
definitions.usage_context_es: El estado de estar libre del control, influencia, apoyo o ayuda de otros.

definitions.usage_example: This is a key indicator of success.
definitions.usage_example_es: Este es un indicador clave de éxito.
definitions.usage_context_en: A thing that shows the state or level of something.
definitions.usage_context_es: Algo que muestra el estado o nivel de algo.

definitions.usage_example: Each individual must sign the form.
definitions.usage_example_es: Cada individuo debe firmar el formulario.
definitions.usage_context_en: A single human being as distinct from a group.
definitions.usage_context_es: Un solo ser humano distinto de un grupo.

definitions.usage_context_en: Difference in size, degree, circumstances, etc.; lack of equality.
definitions.usage_context_es: Diferencia en tamaño, grado, circunstancias, etc.; falta de igualdad.

definitions.usage_context_en: The ability to assess and start things independently.
definitions.usage_context_es: La habilidad de evaluar y comenzar cosas de forma independiente.

definitions.usage_context_en: A new method, idea, or product.
definitions.usage_context_es: Un nuevo método, idea o producto.

definitions.usage_context_en: The capacity to gain an accurate and deep understanding of someone or something.
definitions.usage_context_es: La capacidad de obtener una comprensión precisa y profunda de alguien o algo.

definitions.usage_example: The car failed the safety inspection.
definitions.usage_example_es: El coche no pasó la inspección de seguridad.
definitions.usage_context_en: Careful examination or scrutiny.
definitions.usage_context_es: Examen cuidadoso o escrutinio.

definitions.usage_context_en: Communication or direct involvement with someone or something.
definitions.usage_context_es: Comunicación o participación directa con alguien o algo.

definitions.usage_example: I have an interest in history.
definitions.usage_context_en: The feeling of wanting to know or learn about something.
definitions.usage_context_es: El sentimiento de querer saber o aprender sobre algo.

definitions.usage_example_es: El banco paga un interés alto.
definitions.usage_context_en: Money paid regularly at a particular rate for the use of money lent.
definitions.usage_context_es: Dinero pagado regularmente a una tasa particular por el uso de dinero prestado.

definitions.usage_example: What is your interpretation of the poem?
definitions.usage_context_en: The action of explaining the meaning of something.
definitions.usage_context_es: La acción de explicar el significado de algo.

definitions.usage_example_es: La intervención del gobierno fue necesaria.
definitions.usage_context_en: The action or process of becoming involved in a difficult situation in order to improve it.
definitions.usage_context_es: La acción o proceso de involucrarse en una situación difícil para mejorarla.

definitions.usage_context_en: The ability to make considered decisions or come to sensible conclusions.
definitions.usage_context_es: La habilidad de tomar decisiones consideradas o llegar a conclusiones sensatas.

definitions.usage_context_en: Laws, considered collectively.
definitions.usage_context_es: Leyes, consideradas colectivamente.

definitions.usage_context_en: A limiting rule or circumstance; a restriction.
definitions.usage_context_es: Una regla o circunstancia limitante; una restricción.

definitions.usage_context_en: The process of preserving a condition or situation or the state of being preserved.
definitions.usage_context_es: El proceso de preservar una condición o situación, o el estado de ser preservado.

definitions.usage_context_en: The state, fact, or period of being fully developed or adult.
definitions.usage_context_es: El estado, hecho o período de estar completamente desarrollado o ser adulto.

definitions.usage_example_es: El mecanismo del reloj está roto.
definitions.usage_context_en: A system of parts working together in a machine; a piece of machinery.
definitions.usage_context_es: Un sistema de partes que trabajan juntas en una máquina; una pieza de maquinaria.

definitions.usage_context_en: The characteristic attitude of mind or way of thinking of a person or group.
definitions.usage_context_es: La actitud mental característica o forma de pensar de una persona o grupo.

definitions.usage_example: We are using a new methodology.
definitions.usage_context_en: A system of methods used in a particular area of study or activity.
definitions.usage_context_es: Un sistema de métodos utilizado en un área particular de estudio o actividad.

definitions.usage_context_en: A failure to understand something correctly.
definitions.usage_context_es: Un fallo en entender algo correctamente.

definitions.usage_context_en: The force or speed with which something moves or develops.
definitions.usage_context_es: La fuerza o velocidad con la que algo se mueve o desarrolla.

definitions.usage_example: What is your motivation to study?
definitions.usage_context_en: The reason or reasons one has for acting or behaving in a particular way.
definitions.usage_context_es: La razón o razones que uno tiene para actuar o comportarse de una manera particular.

definitions.usage_example: I have a vague notion of what happened.
definitions.usage_example_es: Tengo una vaga noción de lo que pasó.
definitions.usage_context_en: A conception of or belief about something; an impulse or desire.
definitions.usage_context_es: Una concepción o creencia sobre algo; un impulso o deseo.

definitions.usage_example: You have no obligation to stay.
definitions.usage_context_en: An act or course of action to which a person is morally or legally bound; a duty.
definitions.usage_context_es: Un acto o curso de acción al que una persona está moral o legalmente obligada; un deber.

definitions.usage_example: Please state your name and occupation.
definitions.usage_example_es: Por favor, indique su nombre y ocupación.
definitions.usage_context_en: A person's job or profession.
definitions.usage_context_es: El trabajo o profesión de una persona.

definitions.usage_example: Who has ownership of this car?
definitions.usage_example_es: ¿Quién tiene la propiedad de este coche?
definitions.usage_context_en: The act, state, or right of possessing something.
definitions.usage_context_es: El acto, estado o derecho de poseer algo.

definitions.usage_context_en: A seemingly absurd or self-contradictory statement that may be true.
definitions.usage_context_es: Una declaración aparentemente absurda o autocontradictoria que puede ser cierta.

definitions.usage_context_en: A person who takes part in something.
definitions.usage_context_es: Una persona que toma parte en algo.

definitions.usage_example: You need a lot of patience.
definitions.usage_context_en: The capacity to accept or tolerate delay, trouble, or suffering without getting angry.
definitions.usage_context_es: La capacidad de aceptar o tolerar retrasos, problemas o sufrimiento sin enfadarse.

definitions.usage_example: The penalty for speeding is high.
definitions.usage_example_es: La multa por exceso de velocidad es alta.
definitions.usage_context_en: A punishment imposed for breaking a law, rule, or contract.
definitions.usage_context_es: Un castigo impuesto por infringir una ley, regla o contrato.

definitions.usage_example: We need to change public perception.
definitions.usage_context_en: The way in which something is regarded, understood, or interpreted.
definitions.usage_context_es: La forma en que algo es considerado, entendido o interpretado.

definitions.usage_context_en: The study of the fundamental nature of knowledge, reality, and existence.
definitions.usage_context_es: El estudio de la naturaleza fundamental del conocimiento, la realidad y la existencia.

definitions.usage_example_es: Es una política de la empresa.
definitions.usage_context_en: A course or principle of action adopted or proposed by a government, party, business, or individual.
definitions.usage_context_es: Un curso o principio de acción adoptado o propuesto por un gobierno, partido, negocio o individuo.

definitions.usage_example: She has a life insurance policy.
definitions.usage_example_es: Ella tiene una póliza de seguro de vida.
definitions.usage_context_en: A contract of insurance.
definitions.usage_context_es: Un contrato de seguro.

definitions.usage_context_en: A person who is professionally involved in politics, especially as a holder of an elected office.
definitions.usage_context_es: Una persona que está involucrada profesionalmente en la política, especialmente como titular de un cargo electo.

definitions.usage_example: We need to reduce air pollution.
definitions.usage_example_es: Necesitamos reducir la contaminación del aire.
definitions.usage_context_en: The presence of harmful substances or contaminants in the environment.
definitions.usage_context_es: La presencia de sustancias dañinas o contaminantes en el medio ambiente.

definitions.usage_example: She has the potential to succeed.
definitions.usage_example_es: Ella tiene el potencial para triunfar.
definitions.usage_context_en: Latent qualities or abilities that may be developed and lead to future success.
definitions.usage_context_es: Cualidades o habilidades latentes que pueden desarrollarse y conducir al éxito futuro.

definitions.usage_example: Education is a privilege, not a right.
definitions.usage_example_es: La educación es un privilegio, no un derecho.
definitions.usage_context_en: A special right, advantage, or immunity granted or available only to a particular person or group.
definitions.usage_context_es: Un derecho, ventaja o inmunidad especial concedido o disponible solo para una persona o grupo en particular.

definitions.usage_context_en: An established or official way of doing something.
definitions.usage_context_es: Una forma establecida u oficial de hacer algo.

definitions.usage_example: A large proportion of the budget.
definitions.usage_context_en: A part, share, or number considered in comparative relation to a whole.
definitions.usage_context_es: Una parte, cuota o número considerado en relación comparativa con un todo.

definitions.usage_example: The prospect of failure is low.
definitions.usage_example_es: La perspectiva de fracaso es baja.
definitions.usage_context_en: The possibility or likelihood of some future event occurring.
definitions.usage_context_es: La posibilidad o probabilidad de que ocurra algún evento futuro.

definitions.usage_example: He is a good prospect for the sales team.
definitions.usage_example_es: Él es un buen cliente potencial para el equipo de ventas.
definitions.usage_context_en: A person regarded as likely to succeed or as a potential customer.
definitions.usage_context_es: Una persona considerada como probable de tener éxito o como un cliente potencial.

definitions.usage_context_en: A suggestion or proposal as to the best course of action.
definitions.usage_context_es: Una sugerencia o propuesta sobre el mejor curso de acción.

definitions.usage_example: The reliability of the data is low.
definitions.usage_example_es: La fiabilidad de los datos es baja.
definitions.usage_context_en: The quality of being trustworthy or of performing consistently well.
definitions.usage_context_es: La cualidad de ser digno de confianza o de funcionar consistentemente bien.

definitions.usage_example: The company's revenue grew last year.
definitions.usage_example_es: Los ingresos de la compañía crecieron el año pasado.
definitions.usage_context_en: Income, especially when of a company or organization and of a substantial nature.
definitions.usage_context_es: Ingresos, especialmente de una compañía u organización y de naturaleza sustancial.

definitions.usage_example: What is your schedule for today?
definitions.usage_context_en: A plan for carrying out a process or procedure, giving lists of intended events and times.
definitions.usage_context_es: Un plan para llevar a cabo un proceso, dando listas de eventos y horas previstas.

definitions.usage_context_en: A physical feeling resulting from something that happens to or comes into contact with the body.
definitions.usage_context_es: Un sentimiento físico resultante de algo que le sucede o entra en contacto con el cuerpo.

definitions.usage_example: The new movie was a sensation.
definitions.usage_example_es: La nueva película fue una sensación.
definitions.usage_context_en: A widespread reaction of interest and excitement.
definitions.usage_context_es: Una reacción generalizada de interés y emoción.

definitions.usage_context_en: The state of being resistant to change and not likely to fall or collapse.
definitions.usage_context_es: El estado de ser resistente al cambio y no propenso a caer o colapsar.

definitions.usage_example_es: Él tiene una gran fuerza física.
definitions.usage_context_en: The quality or state of being physically strong.
definitions.usage_context_es: La cualidad o estado de ser físicamente fuerte.

definitions.usage_example: Her main strength is her determination.
definitions.usage_example_es: Su principal fortaleza es su determinación.
definitions.usage_context_en: A good or beneficial quality or attribute of a person or thing.
definitions.usage_context_es: Una cualidad o atributo bueno o beneficioso de una persona o cosa.

definitions.usage_context_en: A particular kind of matter with uniform properties.
definitions.usage_context_es: Un tipo particular de materia con propiedades uniformes.

definitions.usage_context_en: The real or essential meaning; significance.
definitions.usage_context_es: El significado real o esencial; significancia.

definitions.usage_context_en: A brief statement or account of the main points of something.
definitions.usage_context_es: Una breve declaración o relato de los puntos principales de algo.

definitions.usage_example_es: Los niños necesitan supervisión de un adulto.
definitions.usage_context_en: The action of overseeing or monitoring a person or activity.
definitions.usage_context_es: La acción de supervisar o monitorear a una persona o actividad.

definitions.usage_context_en: Material assistance or emotional help given to someone.
definitions.usage_context_es: Asistencia material o ayuda emocional dada a alguien.

definitions.usage_example: The bridge needs a new support.
definitions.usage_example_es: El puente necesita un nuevo soporte.
definitions.usage_context_en: A structure that bears the weight of something from below.
definitions.usage_context_es: Una estructura que soporta el peso de algo desde abajo.

definitions.usage_example: He has a tendency to be late.
definitions.usage_example_es: Él tiene tendencia a llegar tarde.
definitions.usage_context_en: An inclination toward a particular characteristic or type of behavior.
definitions.usage_context_es: Una inclinación hacia una característica o tipo de comportamiento particular.

definitions.usage_context_en: A statement of an intention to inflict pain, injury, damage, or other hostile action.
definitions.usage_context_es: Una declaración de la intención de infligir dolor, lesión, daño u otra acción hostil.

definitions.usage_example: Pollution is a threat to wildlife.
definitions.usage_example_es: La contaminación es una amenaza para la vida silvestre.
definitions.usage_context_en: A person or thing likely to cause damage or danger.
definitions.usage_context_es: Una persona o cosa que probablemente cause daño o peligro.

definitions.usage_context_en: A long-established custom or belief passed down from one generation to another.
definitions.usage_context_es: Una costumbre o creencia establecida desde hace tiempo y transmitida de una generación a otra.

definitions.usage_context_en: An instance of buying or selling something; a business deal.
definitions.usage_context_es: Una instancia de comprar o vender algo; un acuerdo comercial.

definitions.usage_context_en: The process or a period of changing from one state or condition to another.
definitions.usage_context_es: El proceso o un período de cambio de un estado o condición a otro.

definitions.usage_example: He is receiving treatment for cancer.
definitions.usage_example_es: Él está recibiendo tratamiento para el cáncer.
definitions.usage_context_en: Medical care given to a patient for an illness or injury.
definitions.usage_context_es: Atención médica dada a un paciente por una enfermedad o lesión.

definitions.usage_example: His treatment of his employees is bad.
definitions.usage_example_es: Su trato hacia sus empleados es malo.
definitions.usage_context_en: The way one behaves toward or deals with someone or something.
definitions.usage_context_es: La forma en que uno se comporta o trata a alguien o algo.

definitions.usage_example: Trust is important in a relationship.
definitions.usage_example_es: La confianza es importante en una relación.
definitions.usage_context_en: Firm belief in the reliability, truth, ability, or strength of someone or something.
definitions.usage_context_es: Creencia firme en la fiabilidad, verdad, habilidad o fuerza de alguien o algo.

definitions.usage_example: There is a lot of uncertainty.
definitions.usage_context_en: The state of being unsure of something.
definitions.usage_context_es: El estado de no estar seguro de algo.

definitions.usage_context_en: An act of defeating an enemy or opponent in a battle, game, or other competition.
definitions.usage_context_es: Un acto de derrotar a un enemigo u oponente en una batalla, juego u otra competición.

definitions.usage_context_en: Behavior involving physical force intended to hurt, damage, or kill someone.
definitions.usage_context_es: Comportamiento que implica fuerza física con la intención de herir, dañar o matar a alguien.

definitions.usage_context_en: The faculty or state of being able to see.
definitions.usage_context_es: La facultad o estado de poder ver.

definitions.usage_example: The CEO shared his vision for the company.
definitions.usage_example_es: El CEO compartió su visión para la compañía.
definitions.usage_context_en: The ability to think about or plan the future with imagination or wisdom.
definitions.usage_context_es: La habilidad de pensar o planificar el futuro con imaginación o sabiduría.

definitions.usage_context_en: The quality of having experience, knowledge, and good judgment.
definitions.usage_context_es: La cualidad de tener experiencia, conocimiento y buen juicio.

definitions.usage_example: She was a witness to the crime.
definitions.usage_context_en: A person who sees an event, typically a crime or accident, take place.
definitions.usage_context_es: Una persona que ve ocurrir un evento, típicamente un crimen o accidente.
